Tag_Youmay.description: the memory | the [[Order of Dominion | branch]] of the Order of the Ancients

Tag_Imageneed.description: ''Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'For centuries the Order of Dominion had subverted nations and seized positions of power for the glory of Achaemenid Empire|Persia. But none of that mattered to the mighty Kassandra. It wasn't for the Greek world that she tore them down - it was for her family.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Bloodline'

General_Description: '''The Order of Dominion''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra hunted down and killed every member of the [[Order of Dominion]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Bloodline]]''
